A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed The Last Jedi more than I liked The Force Awakens. I loved TFA but compared to TLF it felt it was stagnant and didn't take many risks\, it tried to stay true to the Star Wars story. What I loved so much about TLJ is that every scene was a risk and every character had a conflict within themselves that they had to overcome. Unlike TFA it was very unpredictable. In addition\, there were many scenes and dialogue that really resonated wth me and the people I watched it with. Rian Johnsonn created visually stunning and truly compelling story that really resonated with me. I am really looking forward to Episode 9 .
